hero.title: Keep games fast. Keep browsing private.
hero.subtitle: Family Privacy Proxy intelligently routes traffic: direct for latency‑sensitive apps, proxy for privacy‑critical sites. Family‑first controls with zero complexity.

value.title: Performance where it matters. Privacy where it counts.
value.subtitle: Selective routing ensures games and streaming stay fast while social and tracking-heavy destinations go through privacy-protecting proxies.

privacy.title: Smart Privacy
privacy.desc: Automatically routes social and data-harvesting platforms through secure proxies.

performance.title: Gaming Performance
performance.desc: Bypasses proxies for latency-sensitive apps like games and video calls.

family.title: Family Controls
family.desc: Profiles, shared rules, and simple monitoring built for families.

how.title: Hybrid local-edge routing
how.subtitle: A lightweight local agent makes instant routing decisions; Cloudflare Workers provide privacy at the edge.

steps.1: Install the local agent on your device.
steps.2: Choose routing rules for family members in the web dashboard.
steps.3: Enjoy fast games and private browsing automatically.

pricing.title: Start free. Upgrade when you’re ready.
pricing.subtitle: Simple plans for families. No lock‑in. Cancel anytime.
